in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom

Class SLATimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.robinhood.ticker.TickerView
        • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom.SLATimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, java.lang.Runnable

    public class SLATimer
extends com.robinhood.ticker.TickerView
implements java.lang.Runnable
    An implementation of third party library Ticker. It's kind of timer that is used to display SLA (Service License Agreement) in attractive way.
    In this class, all ui operations are handled in a Handler. This timer can be stop only using stop() method. In stop method, handler's callback has been removed.
    Author:
    mohsin.khan
    Date:
    12/14/2016

      • start

        public SLATimer start()
        To start timer, this method can be used. If value is positive then startDownwardTimer() will be called otherwise startUpwardTimer(). In case of zero millis, no timer will be started.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getTimeStamp

        private java.lang.String getTimeStamp(long t)
        This method will convert millis to dd:HH:MM:SS format 
             t - time
     d - day
     h - hour
     m - minute
     s - second
     r - remainder
        Parameters:
        t - which is to be formatted
        Returns:
        dd:HH:MM:SS
